item.title: 2 more other games scripts(open to criticism)
item.dc:creator: @wickedboy141 wickedboy141
item.description:
@wickedboy141 wrote:

hey ppl,
i posted earlier on and now i am back with too more scripts
i am just trying to learn more about scar by using it
please comment on any of this 2 scripts
all detailes are inside the script
yah and i no they are small but i am still learning so please wait a day or 2 till long scripts
ty

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//      GO TO:http://www.addictinggames.com/curveball.html              //
//      Drag crossair to the game screen                                //
//      press play                                                      //
//      When done press ctrl+alt+s to stop the script                   //
//               MADE BY:wickedboy141                                   //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program New;
var x,y : integer;

procedure findobj;
begin
FindColor(x,y,13369301,0,0,548,399);
Movemousesmooth(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,True);
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
findobj;
until(false)
end.

another script

[code]
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// GO TO:http://www.addictinggames.com/curveball.html //
// Drag crossair to the game screen //
// press play //
// When done press ctrl+alt+s to stop the script //
// MADE BY:wickedboy141 //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program New;
var x,y : integer;

procedure findobj;
begin
FindColor(x,y,13369301,0,0,548,399);
Movemousesmooth(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,True);
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
findobj;
until(false)
end.[/code]
